author: jdillon
msg: o Applied patch GERONIMO-26 by Brent Worden

author: chirino
msg: Updated the Marshaller/Demarshaller to marsahll Throwable system exeptions since the invoke(..) interface changed.
Finished up the InterVMRouting interceptor.  Enabled the test cases for it.

author: jboynes
msg: Change InvocationResult to that it contains application exceptions (as discussed on list)
Now, both normal return and normal application exceptions flow up the main interceptor chain
Only system exceptions (RuntimeEx, Error or container thrown exceptions) are thown up the chain
As a result, Interceptor.invoke now explicitly throws Throwable not Exception

author: jdillon
msg: o Applied patch GERONIMO-23 (fixed error in o.a.g.common.Duration constants  + some unit tests)
